problem.markdown: 4. To increase the frequency of oscillation, which of the following can be utilized? (a) Applied power supply voltage may be increased. (b) Reduce the number of inverter stages. ( ) (a) only ( ) (b) only (x) both (a) and (b) ( ) neither (a) nor (b)
problem.p: 4. To increase the frequency of oscillation, which of the following can be utilized? (a) Applied power supply voltage may be increased. (b) Reduce the number of inverter stages.
